Title: Requires integrated pest management plans in child day care centers, head start day care centers and schools
Summary: Requires integrated pest management plans, as developed or approved by the commissioner of the department of environmental conservation in consultation with the commissioner of education and the commissioner of health, to be implemented in child day care centers, head start day care centers and schools.
LawCode: Add Art 33 Title 17 §§33-1701 - 33-1705, En Con L; amd §390-a, Soc Serv L; add §409-m, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, the social services law and the education law, in relation to integrated pest management
